<head>
<title>second-page</title>

<style>
@font-face {
  font-family: 'Inconsolata';
  src: url('fonts/Inconsolata-Regular.woff2') format('woff2');
}
body {
  font-family: 'Inconsolata', monospace;
}
h1.title { 
    display: none;  /* Titel verstecken */
}
body, html {
  height: 100%;
  font-family: "Inconsolata", sans-serif;
}
select, button {
    margin: 10px 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 16px;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 400px;
}

button {
    background-color: #007bff;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

button:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3;
}

#result {
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    color: #333;
    border-radius: 5px;
    text-align: left;
    max-width: 400px;
    margin: 20px auto;
}

/* Ensure the navigation bar spans the full width of the screen */
#navbar {
  width: 100%; /* Make it span the full width */
  position: fixed; /* Keep it fixed at the top */
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000; /* Ensure it's above other elements */
  background-color: #000; /* Black background */
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

/* Make the nav buttons also fill their columns properly */
.w3-row .w3-button {
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 10px 0;
  color: white;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.w3-row .w3-button:hover {
  background-color: #333; /* Lighter shade for hover effect */
}

/* Ensure the content below starts after the navbar */
body {
  margin-top: 60px; /* Adjust based on navbar height */
}

/* General styling for the rest of the content */
.w3-content {
  margin-top: 20px;
  padding: 10px;
}

#statsTable {
    width: 100%;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    margin-top: 20px;
}

#statsTable th, #statsTable td {
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    padding: 10px;
    text-align: left;
}

#statsTable th {
    background: #f4f4f4;
}
#about {
justify-content: center; /* Zentriert horizontal */
text-align: center; /* Horizontales Zentrieren */
}

#showStats {
    background-color: #000;
    color: white;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
}

<body>

<!-- Links (sit on top) -->
<div class="w3-top">
<div class="w3-row w3-padding w3-black">
<div class="navbar" id="navbar">
<div class="w3-col s3">
<a href="index.html" class="w3-button w3-block w3-black">TABELLEN</a>
</div>
<div class="w3-col s3">
<a href="teams.html" class="w3-button w3-block w3-black">TEAMS</a>
</div>
<div class="w3-col s3">
<a href="spieler.html" class="w3-button w3-block w3-black">PLAYER</a>
</div>
<div class="w3-col s3">
<a href="real11.html" class="w3-button w3-block w3-black">REAL11</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<!-- Add a background color and large text to the whole page -->
<div class="w3-sand w3-grayscale w3-large">

<!-- About Container -->
<div class="w3-container" id="about">
<div class="w3-content" style="max-width:700px">
<h5 class="w3-center w3-padding-64"><span class="w3-tag w3-wide">TEAM</span></h5>
<div>
<select id="teamSelect" onchange="updatePlayerDropdown()">
<option value="">-- wähle ein Team --</option>
</select>
<br>
<select id="categorySelect">
<option value="">-- wähle eine Kategorie --</option>
<option value="keypoints">Keypoints</option>
<option value="letzte_spiele">Letzte Spiele</option>
<option value="formation">Formation</option>
<option value="erwartete_s11">Erwartete S11</option>
<option value="tore">Tore</option>
<option value="spieler">Spieler</option>
</select>
<br>
<button id="showStats">Anzeigen</button>
<div id="result">
<canvas id="chart" width="400" height="200"></canvas>
<table id="statsTable"></table>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>


<!-- End page content -->
</div>

<!-- Footer -->
<footer class="w3-center w3-light-grey w3-padding-48 w3-large">
<p>Created by Moritz</p>
</footer>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Chart.js/4.0.1/chart.umd.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/PapaParse/5.3.0/papaparse.min.js"></script>
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    const teams = ["Berliner SC II", "Team B", "Team C"]; // Beispielteams
    const teamSelect = document.getElementById("teamSelect");
    const categorySelect = document.getElementById("categorySelect");
    const showStatsButton = document.getElementById("showStats");
    const resultTable = document.getElementById("statsTable");
    const chartCanvas = document.getElementById("chart");
    // Teams in das Dropdown einfügen
    teams.forEach(team => {
        const option = document.createElement("option");
        option.value = team;
        option.textContent = team;
        teamSelect.appendChild(option);
    });
    // Event Listener für den Button
    showStatsButton.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const selectedTeam = teamSelect.value;
        const selectedCategory = categorySelect.value;
        if (!selectedTeam || !selectedCategory) {
            alert("Bitte wähle ein Team und eine Kategorie.");
            return;
        }
        // Lade Daten je nach Kategorie
        if (selectedCategory === "keypoints") {
            loadCSV("keypoints.csv", selectedTeam, displayKeypoints);
        } else if (selectedCategory === "letzte_spiele") {
            loadCSV("letzte_spiele.csv", selectedTeam, displayLastGames);
        } else {
            alert("Diese Kategorie wird noch nicht unterstützt.");
        }
    });
    // CSV-Datei laden
    function loadCSV(file, team, callback) {
        Papa.parse(file, {
            download: true,
            header: true,
            complete: function(results) {
                const filteredData = results.data.filter(row => row.team === team);
                callback(filteredData);
            }
        });
    }
    // Keypoints anzeigen
    function displayKeypoints(data) {
        resultTable.innerHTML = "";
        if (data.length === 0) {
            resultTable.innerHTML = "<tr><td>Keine Daten verfügbar</td></tr>";
            return;
        }
        // Kopfzeile
        const headerRow = document.createElement("tr");
        ["Key", "Value"].forEach(column => {
            const th = document.createElement("th");
            th.textContent = column;
            headerRow.appendChild(th);
        });
        resultTable.appendChild(headerRow);
        // Datenzeilen
        data.forEach(row => {
            const tr = document.createElement("tr");
            const keyCell = document.createElement("td");
            keyCell.textContent = row.key;
            const valueCell = document.createElement("td");
            valueCell.textContent = row.value;
            tr.appendChild(keyCell);
            tr.appendChild(valueCell);
            resultTable.appendChild(tr);
        });
    }
    // Letzte Spiele anzeigen
    function displayLastGames(data) {
        resultTable.innerHTML = "";
        if (data.length === 0) {
            resultTable.innerHTML = "<tr><td>Keine Daten verfügbar</td></tr>";
            return;
        }
        // Kopfzeile
        const headerRow = document.createElement("tr");
        ["Spieltag", "Gegner", "Ergebnis"].forEach(column => {
            const th = document.createElement("th");
            th.textContent = column;
            headerRow.appendChild(th);
        });
        resultTable.appendChild(headerRow);
        // Datenzeilen
        data.forEach(row => {
            const tr = document.createElement("tr");
            const spieltagCell = document.createElement("td");
            spieltagCell.textContent = row.spieltag;
            const gegnerCell = document.createElement("td");
            gegnerCell.textContent = row.gegner;
            const ergebnisCell = document.createElement("td");
            ergebnisCell.textContent = row.ergebnis;
            tr.appendChild(spieltagCell);
            tr.appendChild(gegnerCell);
            tr.appendChild(ergebnisCell);
            resultTable.appendChild(tr);
        });
    }
});
</script>
</body>
</html>
